website_summaries.verdict: With a neat design, a low price and power enough for the essentials, the Nokia 5 is budget Android done well.
pros: The Nokia 5 is affordable, looks good and has a battery that won't quit on you before the day's done
cons: It's only powerful enough for the essentials and the camera doesn't take brilliant shots

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: The phone has enough memory and octacore speed for my needs. Decent camera. The build quality is nice with milled aluminum body. Battery life seems better than I expected based on other reviews. 16GB storage is a little small, but I'll transfer the 32GB card from my old phone, not a big deal. The phone came with Android 7 installed, but upgraded easily to Android 9.0, not sure if there will be any further upgrades. Pure stock Android, so maybe a better chance.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed with this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this phone. I cannot get pictures from the messenger app. I called tech support, who has not gotten back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Sound on Phone Calls
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to improve this issue, even though the techs have tried. You simply cannot hear the other person when you make a phone call. Incoming calls are a bit better, but forget about outgoing calls. Returned with regrets, because the rest of the phone is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: OK except does not support wifi calling
customer_reviews.text: Cell reception is exceptionally bad at my house, and this phone does not pick up signal anywhere on the property. My old Nokia Lumia (Windows) phone got reasonable reception in a few places, this phone perhaps has weaker antennae. Normally I'd just enable wifi calling and all would be well, but this phone does not support wifi calling at all. Other than that, it's a perfectly good smart phone, with straight Android, no carrier bloat.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: Best of three budget phones
customer_reviews.text: This is my third budget phone and the best so far. I first had a Moto which was good, adequate really. I lost it and too quickly replaced it without much research with an Alcatel Kora. That phone was a complete waste of $70. So after nearly 2 years of terrible functioning, I purchased the Nokia 5. This is a wonderful $90 cell phone. Great build quality, fast performance, superb call quality, very good battery life , fingerprint security all for under $100. Upon arrival, I switched existing Sim card into the phone, signed on with Google account and magically had contacts and apps on the new Nokia 5. I no longer hate interacting with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: AJAx

customer_reviews.title: Factory Defect
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a factory defect. My phone would turn in and then have no way to unlock it. The device was completely unlockable unless I had done a hard reset using the volume and power button in a way I found on youtube. I chose to send it back and refumd my money.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Phone dead after an update, used 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: 6 months, that is exactly how much was needed to this phone to die. After an update I've received a message I attached as a pic, which got stuck in an endless loop- hard reset never worked. Nokia support told me that I have to contact the seller, and the seller, Amazon, was unavailable. Amazon customer service did absolutely nothing - "your return window has closed, sorry, no options here". I absolutely don't recommend this phone for two reasons - first, is poor product support and second is that it may really die - an update gone wrong will affect the hardware, better don't take the risks and take something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item and transaction
customer_reviews.text: This item was received so quickly, was exactly as described in the ad and was a great deal. Would definitely recommend ordering from this seller to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This phone fell once with a case and the screen still managed to crack. And just from that, the phone has started to fail. Camera won't start, losing signal and now officially doesn't want to restart. My sister has a Moto G6 and shes had it for 2 years and has suffered multiple falls and still works perfectly. Definitely not worth it. And supposedly the camera is good but it sucks. My old phone with 8MP took better pics than this one. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Avila

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works good but a little confusing to get set up and I don't like some of the apps
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Charge. Doesn't connect to computer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this thing for three weeks. It no longer charges and will not connect to the computer as an external drive. Tried three different chargers, three different cables, all with the same result: charging (lightning bolt) shows up in the top left, but battery percentage continues to drop. Will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Its a good phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phone. For its price you won't get better.
customer_reviews.author: Bigm

customer_reviews.title: It's a good cheap Android Pie phone.
customer_reviews.text: Nice budget phone with finger print unlock and faster processer than BLU R1 HD Amazon phone from a couple years ago. About the same system memory but faster SD card capable and updated with the latest Android version.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Excelente decisión
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly, it has been updated constantly on a monthly basis. The aluminum finish makes it feel great and the fingerprint sensor makes life easier. I am very pleased with the quality/price ratio, Nokia is back.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pestana

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Microphone is bad, people cant hear me well. Camera is dark.
customer_reviews.author: CallmeOJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cellphone.
customer_reviews.text: Great cellphone! Nokia is an outstanding brand and this model is really good. If you’re looking for something with an affordable price and good quality, this is my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Castillo

customer_reviews.title: The phone is acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I could find is that pictures quality is not impressive at all. I was expecting to see better pictures than that for a 13mpx camera.
customer_reviews.author: Junior M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is crap, died within an hour of charging, also keeps dialing out even when the screen is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: No longer connects to a USB charger after ~ 3months use. Previous phones I've owned have lasted years, really dissapointing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barton

customer_reviews.title: Quality Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, easy to use and has great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: awesome device
customer_reviews.text: Awesome working product put the sim card in and Go
customer_reviews.author: Tony corrocher

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good Phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone kept freezing. The screen brightness would move up and down on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who has cricket wireless. He had a crappy galaxy amp 2 and I wanted to upgrade his phone for Xmas without spending a fortune. This phone was perfect, it was unlocked and new as advertised and works great with his sim card and network. He loves it and it’s really easy to use. We transferred everything from his old phone using the android app SMS Backup and Restore, it was so quick taking only a couple minutes. Would buy again and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great phone worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything bad to say about this phone, it has enough memory for all the apps I use, the battery life lasts all day, and I get better reception in a lot of places I didn't with my old phone. Maybe I'm gushing, I just escaped a windows phone, and so I could still have some rose-tinted glasses, but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2017 model
customer_reviews.text: It is a good phone for the price, but bear in mind it is not the 2018 model that is listed on Nokia's website. This is important when you want to buy a case and the camera is not as good as the newer model. Battery life at the end of a day is around 50% for a person who texts and reads their mail off and on all day. I am happy with the phone since I was more interested in a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wennemar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand some of the other negative reviews. For the money, this phone is excellent. Of course it's not a high end phone, but it can do everything you need. For 99% of all folks this is perfectly fine. Good build quality, good screen, lots of features for the money. I had a Nokia 2 before which was almost unusable due to to the low memory. This phone is way better.
customer_reviews.author: tk_seggel

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement phone
customer_reviews.text: Replaced damaged carrier phone with this through their BYOP system. They never knew the difference, but this phone has a much better feature set and feels much better in the hand per the customer. They had an old LG Android 4 phone when under contract, but now rock the Nokia. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: The phone feels nice and screen is okay the rest is dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed by this device and although it was only $100 I wished I had made a different choice. It's slow and breezes or stutters during use. There is not enough memory for apps or storing a decent amount of photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Adontai

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I thought that Nokia is like the old Nokia. No sir is just an other Chinese manufacturer that wanna get in the US market. Slow like molasses. Look for other brand maybe Huawei, Xiaomi.
customer_reviews.author: F.A.L

customer_reviews.title: Bottom 2 keys & fingerprint scanner did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, attempted to go through the start up procedure and couldn't get that far because the bottom 2 navigation buttons and the fingerprint scanner didn't function. I sent it back. Oh well, waste of my time but got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he needed something simple and is pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Get it new, not a referb.
customer_reviews.text: Camera good for the $$, battery life was too. Only problem is it didn't even last a year before it totally bit the dust beyond repair. Sorry I got a refurbed one. The new one I got for my kid is still working.
customer_reviews.author: MavenMommy

product_meta.title: Nokia 5 - Android 9.0 Pie - 16 GB - Single Sim Unlocked Smartphone (AT&T/T-Mobile/Metropcs/Cricket/Mint) - 5.2" Screen - Silver
product_meta.description: The Nokia 5 utilizes an efficient and powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 mobile platform with 2GB of RAM and 16GB of storage with an expandable storage capacity of 256GB with a micro SD card. Featuring a beautiful 5. 2” HD screen with smooth rounded edges and Corning Gorilla Glass the Nokia 5 brings sleek and modern design in a Compact Package. Take advantage of the 13MP rear camera for amazing images and an 8MP front camera so your selfies look better than ever. Built with user experience in mind, the Nokia 5 has pure, secure and up-to-date Android with monthly updates so you always have the best Android available and brings you Advanced connection options including Bluetooth 4. 1 LE, OTG, Volte, voice over Wi-Fi, and a fingerprint sensor ensuring that your phone has the features you want.
feature_bullets: Efficient and powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 mobile platform with 2GB of RAM and 16GB storage expandable with a 256GB with a Micro SD
Beautiful 5. 2” HD screen with smooth rounded edges and Corning Gorilla glass
13MP rear Camera for amazing images and an 8MP front Camera so your selfies look better than ever
Built with pure, secure and up-to-date Android with monthly updates so you always have the best Android available with Android 9. 0 Pie available now
Full metal body with built in advanced connection options including Bluetooth 4. 1 LE, OTG, Volte, voice over Wi-Fi, and a fingerprint sensor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars104 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Charging cable, Device, Manual, Wall adapter
